mapper.select: select place_no from plan_list where daily_no = #{dailyNo}

select * from planner p inner join daily d on d.planner_no = p.planner_no inner join dailyplan dp on d.daily_no = dp.daily_no inner join place pl on dp.place_no = pl.place_no where member_no=#{memberNo} and DAILYPLAN_PLACE_ORDER=1 and DAILY_ORDER=1 order by p.planner_no desc

select count(*) from planner p inner join daily d on d.planner_no = p.planner_no inner join dailyplan dp on d.daily_no = dp.daily_no inner join place pl on dp.place_no = pl.place_no where DAILYPLAN_PLACE_ORDER=1 and DAILY_ORDER=1 order by p.planner_no desc
